Introduction

SPARKLING was a four-member fictional project boy group created for KBS2’s drama "Imitation".

In the drama, the group is signed with Musicholic and consists of Yoojin (portrayed by ATEEZ's Yunho), Hyunoh (portrayed by Boys Republic’s Suwoong), Seyoung (portrayed by ATEEZ's Seonghwa), and Minsoo (portrayed by ATEEZ's San).

To tease the drama and add a touch of reality, SNS accounts were opened for the group, notably a Twitter account on April 5, 2021, and an Instagram account on April 8. A poster spoiler was also revealed on April 12, followed by an official group poster posted the next day, on April 13, teasing the date May 7, 2021.

SPARKLING debuted on May 28, 2021, with the digital single "DIAMOND". The group eventually disbanded with the end of the drama and the last release titled "Your Sign", sang along TEAPARTY, SHAX, and LA LIMA.
